Faction.name: {=clan_baltic_2.name}Deltuva
Faction.text: {=clan_lithuania.text}This clan represents the Lithuanian principality. This clan is non-historical due to the lack of written sources. It was created for the reconstruction of the Baltic region. The clan coat of arms is a variation of the Baltic Jumis symbol.
